question: [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-bitvec/src/lib.rs] [Function: count_ones()] [Performance DoS] Can a malicious validator send BitVecs with all bits set (65536 ones) to force expensive count_ones() operations on victim validators during consensus rounds? (Medium)
